snippet: A federal judge in Texas found a JetBlue Airways pilot who left the cockpit during a flight and screamed about terrorists not guilty by reason of insanity on Tuesday.
abstract: Federal judge in Texas finds Clayton F Osbon, a JetBlue Airways pilot who left the cockpit during a flight and screamed about terrorists, not guilty by reason of insanity.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge in Texas found a JetBlue Airways pilot who left the cockpit during a flight and screamed about terrorists not guilty by reason of insanity on Tuesday.

headline.seo: Disruptive JetBlue Pilot Is Acquitted in Texas
